titleStmt.title: Jonathan Davis to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2173

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Taylorsvile
N S James MD
Taylorsville Spen Co Ky
Sept 25 1865
To His Excellency
Thos E Bramlete
Govr of the Commonwealth of Kentucky
Dr Sir
The petition now on file at Frankfort, recommending David R. Poignard to fill a vacancy as a Justice of the peace in Justices district (No 1) was written by myself

The vacancy results from the fact that at the last August election a postmaster by the name of John C. Vandyke was elected, but being ineligible did not qualify.
My friend D. R. Poignard is well qualified to discharge the duties of the office.

Jona Davis
Presiding Judge of Spen. C. Ct
